  <title>smm_cz_nhd_streams</title>
  <abstract>The National Hydrography Database (NHD) is used to map streams and other water conveyance features such as canals, pipes, etc. These features are used for mapping, flow modelling, etc. 

This dataset contains linear features from the National Hydrography Database (NHD) pertaining to the Los Angeles County portion of the Santa Monica Mountains and surrounding areas.</abstract>
